remarks: The identity arrow in the category of extensible structures is the identity function of base sets.  (Contributed by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
statement:
estrccat.c $e |- C = ( ExtStrCat ` U ) $.
estrcid.o $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
estrcid.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
estrcid.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. U ) $.
estrcid $p |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) = ( _I |` ( Base ` X ) ) ) $.
